pkgmetadata.longdescription: Client for 'GenderAPI.io' Phone Number Validation and Formatter API // Provides an interface to the 'GenderAPI.io' Phone Number Validation Formatter API (https://www.genderapi.io) for validating international phone numbers, detecting number type (mobile, landline, Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP)), retrieving region and country metadata, and formatting numbers to E.164 or national format. Designed to simplify integration into R workflows for data validation, Customer Relationship Management (CRM) data cleaning, and analytics tasks. Full documentation is available at https://www.genderapi.io/docs- phone-validation-formatter-api.
